level.heading: Permit issued or work commenced prior to effective date.
level.text: ยง28-101.4.1 Permit issued or work commenced prior to effective date. If a permit for work was issued prior to the effective date of this code or, if no permit was necessary, work was commenced prior to such effective date, all of the provisions of chapter 1 of title 27 of the administrative code as heretofore in effect shall apply to such work.
